title: eppOdum inbam
sahitya:
eppOdum inbam inbamE iniya rAgavardhini enadu manadil Ura


anupallavi

  muppOdum ammai appan mudalvan Adi bhagavan munninrennai naDattum innanba ninaittiDin


caraNam    tAmasa rAjasa taDaigaL uDaipaDavE sAtvika vEgattAl shakti naDai peravE
kAmamellAm shivakAmamadAgavE kaNNum karuttum adil kalanda kalaviyilE
